channel.title: The Straits Times Singapore News
channel.description: The Straits Times - Get exclusive stories, in-depth analyses and award-winning multimedia content about Singapore, Asia and the world.

item.title: Orchard Road malls, Geylang Serai market among new places visited by Covid-19 patients while infectious
item.description:
August 30, 2020 12:07 AM

SINGAPORE - Several malls in Orchard Road and Geylang Serai market were among the new places added on Saturday (Aug 29) to the Ministry of Health's (MOH) list of places visited by Covid-19 patients while they were infectious.
